com.nv.util
Class BeanUtility

java.lang.Object
  com.nv.util.BeanUtility

public class BeanUtility
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the ability to create beans, dynamically access bean properties, and invoke bean methods using introspection.

Author:
roy.terrell

Returns:

initializeBean

public java.lang.Object initializeBean()
Initializes all primitive properties of the target java bean. Sets numbers to zero, boolean to false, Character and String to "". This method was implemented for the purpose of converting null values to empty string values of String properties of a java bean initially containig null values. This prevents the client JSP from displaying the String, "null", for those string properties of a bean that contain null values.

Returns:
The initialized bean.
